page.title: 01NORTHWOOD
page.content: Northwood, a small London suburb, has changed since after the Second World War. Northwood used to be a village, but has now become a busy shopping place. During the Second World War a flying bomb hit Northwood killing four people.Northwood is a residental area. There are many houses and there are always some being built. Most of the houses are detached and have four bedrooms.There are a few schools in Northwood; Northwood college, St. Helens and Frithwood Primary School, which is in Carew Road. There is a big NATO Base in Northwood. There are many houses within the base and Naval and R.A.F. people live there for a limited time. This means there are many people of different nationalities in Northwood. The London Bible College is based here and there are four different churches. It is a changing p
